name: Anxious
description: Feeling worried, nervous, or uneasy about something with an uncertain outcome.

descriptionTranslations.en: Feeling worried, nervous, or uneasy about something with an uncertain outcome.
descriptionTranslations.ko: 불확실한 결과에 대해 걱정하거나 불안하거나 불편함을 느끼는 상태.

name: Energized
description: Feeling full of energy and enthusiasm.

descriptionTranslations.en: Feeling full of energy and enthusiasm.

name: Tired
description: Feeling in need of rest or sleep; fatigued.

descriptionTranslations.en: Feeling in need of rest or sleep; fatigued.

name: Overwhelmed
description: Feeling buried or overcome by too many things to deal with.

descriptionTranslations.en: Feeling buried or overcome by too many things to deal with.
descriptionTranslations.ko: 처리해야 할 일이 너무 많아 부담을 느끼거나 압도당하는 상태.

name: Inspired
description: Feeling mentally stimulated to do or feel something creative.

descriptionTranslations.en: Feeling mentally stimulated to do or feel something creative.
descriptionTranslations.ko: 창의적인 것을 하거나 느끼도록 정신적으로 자극받은 상태.
